DbDetails.queryFormat: SELECT so_number,product_number,product_name,so_qty,i_mat.item_number,i_mat.item_name,mat_lot.lot_number,SUM(p_wip.pallet_quantity) wip_qty FROM pallet_transaction p_wip JOIN inv_transaction i_wip ON p_wip.inv_transaction_id = i_wip.inv_transaction_id JOIN item i_mat ON i_mat.item_id_m=i_wip.item_id_m JOIN inv_lot_number mat_lot ON p_wip.inv_lot_number_id=mat_lot.inv_lot_number_id JOIN (SELECT i_so.document_number so_number,i_prod.item_number product_number,i_prod.item_name product_name,SUM(i_so.quantity) so_qty,i_wo.document_type,i_wo.document_number wo_number FROM inv_transaction i_wo JOIN pallet_transaction p_wo ON (i_wo.document_type="wo" AND i_wo.inv_transaction_id=p_wo.inv_transaction_id) JOIN pallet_transaction p_so ON (p_so.pallet_id=p_wo.pallet_id AND p_so.inv_lot_number_id=p_wo.inv_lot_number_id) JOIN inv_transaction i_so ON (i_so.document_type="so" AND i_so.inv_transaction_id=p_so.inv_transaction_id) JOIN item i_prod ON i_so.item_id_m=i_prod.item_id_m GROUP BY i_so.inv_transaction_id) so ON (so.document_type="wo" AND i_wip.document_type="wip" AND so.wo_number=i_wip.document_number) where %{where} GROUP BY p_wip.inv_lot_number_id
